creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Humans&, a ‘human-centric’ AI startup founded by Anthropic, xAI, Google alums, raised $480M seed round
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.
contentSnippet: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.

creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: Indian vibe-coding startup Emergent triples valuation to $300M with $70M fundraise
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million, and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.
contentSnippet: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million, and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.

creator: Rebecca Szkutak
title: Here are the 55 US AI startups that raised $100M or more in 2025
dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
content: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?
contentSnippet: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Rogue agents and shadow AI: Why VCs are betting big on AI security
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Misaligned agents are just one layer of the AI security challenge that startup Witness AI is trying to solve. It detects employee use of unapproved tools, blocking attacks, and ensuring compliance.
contentSnippet: Misaligned agents are just one layer of the AI security challenge that startup Witness AI is trying to solve. It detects employee use of unapproved tools, blocking attacks, and ensuring compliance.

creator: Sarah Perez
title: Well, there goes the metaverse!
dc:creator: Sarah Perez
content: The metaverse is on its last legs as VR is eclipsed by AI. But that's not the only thing that went wrong for Meta's VR ambitions.
contentSnippet: The metaverse is on its last legs as VR is eclipsed by AI. But that's not the only thing that went wrong for Meta's VR ambitions.

creator: Russell Brandom
title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
dc:creator: Russell Brandom
content: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.
contentSnippet: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.

creator: Connie Loizos
title: Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
dc:creator: Connie Loizos
content: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.
contentSnippet: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.

creator: Julie Bort
title: AI cloud startup Runpod hits $120M in ARR — and it started with a Reddit post
dc:creator: Julie Bort
content: Their startup journey is a wild example of how if you build it well and the timing is lucky, they will definitely come.
contentSnippet: Their startup journey is a wild example of how if you build it well and the timing is lucky, they will definitely come.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: California AG sends Musk’s xAI a cease-and-desist order over sexual deepfakes
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: The flood of AI-generated sexual imagery has spurred concern from state and congressional officials alike.
contentSnippet: The flood of AI-generated sexual imagery has spurred concern from state and congressional officials alike.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: From OpenAI’s offices to a deal with Eli Lilly — how Chai Discovery became one of the flashiest names in AI drug development
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: The startup has partnered with Eli Lilly and enjoys the backing of some of Silicon Valley's most influential VCs.
contentSnippet: The startup has partnered with Eli Lilly and enjoys the backing of some of Silicon Valley's most influential VCs.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: ChatGPT users are about to get hit with targeted ads
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: OpenAI says that users impacted by the ads will have some control over what they see.
contentSnippet: OpenAI says that users impacted by the ads will have some control over what they see.

creator: Tim De Chant
title: Trump administration wants tech companies to buy $15B of power plants they may not use
dc:creator: Tim De Chant
content: In an attempt to alleviate rising electricity prices, the White House wants grid operator PJM to hold an auction for new generating capacity, and it wants tech companies to bid.
contentSnippet: In an attempt to alleviate rising electricity prices, the White House wants grid operator PJM to hold an auction for new generating capacity, and it wants tech companies to bid.

creator: Theresa Loconsolo
title: The AI healthcare gold rush is here
dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
content: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about hallucination risks, inaccurate medical information, and […]
contentSnippet: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about hallucination risks, inaccurate medical information, and […]

The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about […]

creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
title: The rise of ‘micro’ apps: non-developers are writing apps instead of buying them
dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
content: A new era of app creation is here. It's fun, it's fast, and it's fleeting.
contentSnippet: A new era of app creation is here. It's fun, it's fast, and it's fleeting.

creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: Anthropic taps former Microsoft India MD to lead Bengaluru expansion
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: Irina Ghose joins Anthropic as India managing director after 24 years at Microsoft.
contentSnippet: Irina Ghose joins Anthropic as India managing director after 24 years at Microsoft.

creator: Connie Loizos
title: Silicon Valley’s messiest breakup is definitely headed to court
dc:creator: Connie Loizos
content: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.
contentSnippet: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: AI journalism startup Symbolic.ai signs deal with Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: The startup claims its AI platform can help optimize editorial processes and research.
contentSnippet: The startup claims its AI platform can help optimize editorial processes and research.

creator: Russell Brandom
title: The AI lab revolving door spins ever faster
dc:creator: Russell Brandom
content: AI labs just can't get their employees to stay put. Yesterday’s big AI news was the abrupt and seemingly acrimonious departure of three top executives at Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines lab.
contentSnippet: AI labs just can't get their employees to stay put. Yesterday’s big AI news was the abrupt and seemingly acrimonious departure of three top executives at Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines lab.

creator: Rebecca Szkutak
title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing
dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
content: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.
contentSnippet: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.
